Honeywell partners with Mark Wahlberg
Wahlberg and his flight operations team partnered with Honeywell to upgrade the flight deck, satellite communications system, services and software solutions on his Bombardier Global Express business jet. The upgrade helps deliver a better flying experience while enhancing the aircraft’s value.

Dealing with uncertainty was part of the job description for aircraft maintenance teams in 2020. While aircraft were parked, maintenance teams continued to perform essential tasks, get a jump on upcoming major service intervals, install new hardware to meet mandates, improve operations or create a better passenger experience.
